modules.title: The Kit Bag
modules.description: Gear up with your TON wallet

slides.title: Welcome to the Kit Bag
slides.body: Hey Future Analyst! Before you step onto the pitch to trade predictions, you need your gear.

slides.title: Why Do I Need It?
slides.body: Unlike a bank that holds your money, a Wallet lets YOU hold your money.

slides.title: Quick Check
slides.question: Who controls your crypto wallet?
slides.explanation: That's right! With a crypto wallet, YOU are in control of your funds. No bank or app developer can freeze or take your money.

slides.title: Your Jersey Number
slides.body: We use TON wallets here. Think of your TON Wallet address like your Jersey Number.

slides.title: Let's Suit Up!
slides.instruction: Connect your TON wallet now to finish this Over.

slides.title: OVER COMPLETE!
slides.body: You've got your kit ready! You're now equipped to step onto the pitch.

slides.title: The Ticket & The Score
slides.body: In cricket, you need a ticket to enter the stadium, and the scoreboard tracks the runs. In crypto, TON is your ticket and USDT keeps the score!

slides.title: TON: Your Match Ticket
slides.body: TON is the native currency of The Open Network. Think of it like your match ticket - its price can go up or down based on demand, just like ticket prices before a big final!

slides.title: USDT: The Scoreboard
slides.body: USDT (Tether) is a stablecoin pegged to the US Dollar. 1 USDT = $1, always. It's like the scoreboard - reliable and steady. Perfect for keeping your winnings safe.

slides.title: Quick Check
slides.question: Which one stays stable in value?
slides.explanation: Correct! USDT is a stablecoin - it's designed to always equal $1. TON's price moves up and down like any other cryptocurrency.

slides.title: When to Use Each
slides.body: Use TON to pay for transactions (gas fees) and when you believe the price will rise. Use USDT to lock in your profits and protect against price swings.

slides.title: Strategy Check
slides.question: You just won big! What's the smartest move to protect your gains?
slides.explanation: Smart thinking! Converting some winnings to USDT locks in your gains. If TON drops, your USDT stays safe at $1.

slides.title: The Winning Combo
slides.body: Pro analysts use both: TON for upside potential and transaction fees, USDT for stability and protecting profits. Balance is key!

slides.title: OVER COMPLETE!
slides.body: You now understand the two key currencies! You're ready to manage your portfolio like a pro analyst.
